titles.title: Meroplankton in Isfjorden 2016 to 2017 â€“ raw data from EcoTaxa project 818

descriptions.description:
Raw data used to build Darwin Core dataset published Meroplankton in Isfjorden 2016 to 2017. https://doi.org/10.15468/c2m9zk The raw data is a complete export of EcoTaxa project 818, containg the metadata for 148306 objects, grouped in the following 37 clusters: ["name", "size"]
["feces",44439]
["fiber<detritus",28193]
["Copepoda",17197]
["detritus",15238]
["badfocus<artefact",12509]
["transparent",10188]
["seaweed",4277]
["veliger",3684]
["nauplii<Cirripedia",3313]
["Gastropoda",1884]
["nauplii<Crustacea",1555]
["Calanoida",1316]
["multiple<Copepoda",1261]
["part<other",814]
["bubble",776]
["temporary<",298]
["t001",226]
["Chaetognatha",179]
["t002",175]
["Amphipoda",143]
["Polychaeta",127]
["egg<other",115]
["t003",96]
["Appendicularia",86]
["Echinodermata",77]
["othertocheck",43]
["Ostracoda",42]
["Caprellidae",12]
["Euphausia",11]
["Asteroidea<Echinodermata",8]
["Hydrozoa",8]
["Bryozoa",6]
["zoea<Decapoda",5]
["t004",2]
["Gymnosomata",1]
["Podon",1]
["Nematoda",1]

Warning: The event metadata in this dataset is incorrect, see the Darwin Core distribution for correct dates, positions, depths, etc. See ecotaxa-darwin-core for a command line tool that transforms EcoTaxa to Darwin Core.
